path.style: stroke: var(--iconStroke, black); fill: var(--iconStroke, black); stroke-width: 2; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round;
stroke: var(--iconStroke, black); fill: var(--iconStroke, black); stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round;
stroke: var(--iconStroke, black); fill: var(--iconStroke, black); stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round;
